item.description:
Hello Everyone!!

First of all I want to apologize that weeks and weeks have passed since our last meetup! I can only say that the last couple of months have been extremely busy for me hosting lots of guests from Europe, working and going to Germany myself that I just haven't been able to squeeze in a "date" for all of us! I hope none of you will hold that against me, because I promise to better myself :-).

I hope many of you can find time on Friday, July 24th around 7 p.m. to meet up at the Hot Club in Providence to catch up and share summer experiences and maybe to plan future meetups together. I am happy to hear suggestions and would love to hear if some of you have some ideas.

I am excited to see many of you soon. Until then - enjoy the summer days! Bis ganz bald - tschuess!!

- Hanna
item.name: Time for some good times again!
